mapper.insert: insert into restaurant (rid, rpassword, rname, rtitle, radress, rtel, rcategory, rdate) values (#{rid}, #{rpassword}, #{rname}, #{rtitle}, #{radress}, #{rtel}, #{rcategory}, NOW())
mapper.select: select rid, rpassword, rname, rtitle, radress, rtel, rcategory, rdate from restaurant where rid = #{rid}
